services.name: Realtor Locator

services.name: Mortgage Lender
services.description: Find a mortgage lender for financing your new home purchase.

services.name: Airalo e-sim
services.description: Purchase international eSIMs for mobile data plans when you arrive.

services.name: Chime Bank
services.description: Online banking services to set up accounts in your new country.

services.name: Wise (Money Transfer)
services.description: Primary service for business related money transfers. Also works for personal.

services.name: Remitly (Money Transfer)
services.description: Quick personal money transfers with many retrieval options. Not for business.

services.name: XE (Money Transfer)
services.description: Personal money transfers with support for a large number of currencies.

services.name: Lemonade (Tenant Insurance)
services.description: Tenant and homeowners insurance for your new residence.

services.name: Figo Pet (Pet Insurance)
services.description: Pet insurance to cover healthcare costs for your pets.

services.name: International Autosource (Car Sales)
services.description: Car sales and leasing for expats and international arrivals.

services.name: Rencars.com (Car Rental)
services.description: Car rental services for temporary transportation needs.

services.name: Experts in Moving (Shipping)
services.description: International shipping services for moving your belongings.
